title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.10 - Firearms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.10 - Firearms

State Regulations
(a) The use, display or discharge of any firearms or other weapons within the parkway
system, except as authorized by the department or by law, is
prohibited. (b) Except in the
performance of official duties, the discharge of a firearm, air gun, spring gun
or other instrument or weapon in such a manner that a projectile enters or is
likely to enter any part of the parkway system, is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
